description: Various insects are depicted attending a movie screening in a theatre. The film title on the screen, 'Return of the Killer Windshield,' reveals a profound irony, as this common object is a source of immense danger and death from an insect's perspective. The scene is rendered absurd by placing these creatures in a human environment and context, watching a horror film about their real-world predator. The surrealism lies in the anthropomorphism of the insects, engaging in leisure activities like humans, highlighting a dramatic shift in perspective. This portrayal underscores the existential threat a mundane human object poses to this particular community.
